content.raw:
We should add some contact parameters to improve contact stability. Here's an example for the `top_*` collisions:

~~~
diff -r bf671da6e2e3 models/space_table/model.sdf
--- a/models/space_table/model.sdf	Mon Feb 27 15:37:33 2017 -0800
+++ b/models/space_table/model.sdf	Tue Mar 07 17:39:51 2017 -0800
@@ -52,6 +52,16 @@
            <size>1.472479 1.016692 0.110764</size>
           </box>
         </geometry>
+        <surface>
+          <contact>
+            <ode>
+              <kp>1e5</kp>
+              <kd>1</kd>
+              <max_vel>0.1</max_vel>
+              <min_depth>0.0015</min_depth>
+            </ode>
+          </contact>
+        </surface>
       </collision>
 
       <collision name="top_2">
@@ -61,6 +71,16 @@
            <size>1.82739 0.712958 0.110764</size>
           </box>
         </geometry>
+        <surface>
+          <contact>
+            <ode>
+              <kp>1e5</kp>
+              <kd>1</kd>
+              <max_vel>0.1</max_vel>
+              <min_depth>0.0015</min_depth>
+            </ode>
+          </contact>
+        </surface>
       </collision>
 
       <collision name="top_3">
@@ -70,6 +90,16 @@
            <size>1.517309 0.929015 0.141255</size>
           </box>
         </geometry>
+        <surface>
+          <contact>
+            <ode>
+              <kp>1e5</kp>
+              <kd>1</kd>
+              <max_vel>0.1</max_vel>
+              <min_depth>0.0015</min_depth>
+            </ode>
+          </contact>
+        </surface>
       </collision>
 
       <collision name="top_4">
@@ -79,6 +109,16 @@
            <size>1.741564 0.714353 0.141255</size>
           </box>
         </geometry>
+        <surface>
+          <contact>
+            <ode>
+              <kp>1e5</kp>
+              <kd>1</kd>
+              <max_vel>0.1</max_vel>
+              <min_depth>0.0015</min_depth>
+            </ode>
+          </contact>
+        </surface>
       </collision>
 
       <collision name="side_1">
~~~
content.html:
We should add some contact parameters to improve contact stability. Here's an example for the top_* collisions:

diff -r bf671da6e2e3 models/space_table/model.sdf
--- a/models/space_table/model.sdf  Mon Feb 27 15:37:33 2017 -0800
+++ b/models/space_table/model.sdf  Tue Mar 07 17:39:51 2017 -0800
@@ -52,6 +52,16 @@
            <size>1.472479 1.016692 0.110764</size>
           </box>
         </geometry>
+        <surface>
+          <contact>
+            <ode>
+              <kp>1e5</kp>
+              <kd>1</kd>
+              <max_vel>0.1</max_vel>
+              <min_depth>0.0015</min_depth>
+            </ode>
+          </contact>
+        </surface>
       </collision>

       <collision name="top_2">
@@ -61,6 +71,16 @@
            <size>1.82739 0.712958 0.110764</size>
           </box>
         </geometry>
+        <surface>
+          <contact>
+            <ode>
+              <kp>1e5</kp>
+              <kd>1</kd>
+              <max_vel>0.1</max_vel>
+              <min_depth>0.0015</min_depth>
+            </ode>
+          </contact>
+        </surface>
       </collision>

       <collision name="top_3">
@@ -70,6 +90,16 @@
            <size>1.517309 0.929015 0.141255</size>
           </box>
         </geometry>
+        <surface>
+          <contact>
+            <ode>
+              <kp>1e5</kp>
+              <kd>1</kd>
+              <max_vel>0.1</max_vel>
+              <min_depth>0.0015</min_depth>
+            </ode>
+          </contact>
+        </surface>
       </collision>

       <collision name="top_4">
@@ -79,6 +109,16 @@
            <size>1.741564 0.714353 0.141255</size>
           </box>
         </geometry>
+        <surface>
+          <contact>
+            <ode>
+              <kp>1e5</kp>
+              <kd>1</kd>
+              <max_vel>0.1</max_vel>
+              <min_depth>0.0015</min_depth>
+            </ode>
+          </contact>
+        </surface>
       </collision>

       <collision name="side_1">
